original_title: マゾに目覚めたボクの彼女 ドＳ一族に調教され開発された婚約者のＭ性
overview: Momo started dating Masaru Kazama, a guy from work. Things are going well and he proposed to marry, which she was happy to hear.  Eventually, she wants to meet with his family, to which he is very reluctant. It ends up happening but by chance, not really by choice.  After meeting with his family, and receiving plenty of compliments for her beauty, Momo learns that for her to be accepted into the Kazama family she would have to pass a “test”.  An important rule and tradition kept in the family for generations.
title: My Girlfriend Awakens Her Inner Sub - Hardcore Doms Breaking In My Submissive Fiance Momo Sakura
